FeatureProvider.Name: OSGeo.SHP.3.0
FeatureProvider.Description: Read/write access to spatial and attribute data in an ESRI SHP file.

FeatureProvider.Name: OSGeo.SDF.3.0
FeatureProvider.Description: Read/write access to Autodesk's spatial database format, a file-based personal geodatabase that supports multiple features/attributes, spatial indexing, and file-locking.
